amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds to establish any live-fire range, training course, or maneuver area within the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands until the Secretary of Defense reaches agreement with the government of the Northern Mariana Islands on the nature and scope of those activities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to establish any live-fire range, training course, or maneuver area within the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sablan amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 256 (Roll no. 349).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sablan amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 256 (Roll no. 349).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A046) offered by Mr. Sablan.
